about_the_game:
Advent 4 Book

This Advent 4 themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! It's time to celebrate the holiday season again, do so with Coloring Pixels!

Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true advent calendar!

Contents

The Advent 4 book unlocks the following images:
  • Day 1: Tree Delivery - 193x125
  • Day 2: Hot Chocolate - 79x105
  • Day 3: Elf on the Shelf - 56x94
  • Day 4: Bells and Holly - 110x106
  • Day 5: Owl - 95x100
  • Day 6: Visiting the North Pole - 66x54
  • Day 7: Cosy Fireplace - 130x111
  • Day 8: Skiing - 72x72
  • Day 9: Stockings - 57x71
  • Day 10: Snowglobe - 100x126
  • Day 11: Santas Sleigh - 113x93
  • Day 12: Nutcracker - 18x45
  • Day 13: Reindeer - 200x200
  • Day 14: Roast Turkey - 96x91
  • Day 15: Northern Lights - 115x65
  • Day 16: Robin - 99x85
  • Day 17: Snowman - 60x81
  • Day 18: Winter Train - 225x98
  • Day 19: Christmas Pudding - 86x78
  • Day 20: Christmas Candle - 53x53
  • Day 21: Log Cabin - 285x230
  • Day 22: Naughty or Nice - 144x111
  • Day 23: Presents Under the Tree - 72x69
  • Day 24: Santa's Workshop - 300x160

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Advent 4 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
